Review.Contenu: The item purchased (Dyson Fluffy Powerhead) was used and defective.  Seller did not respond to my request for a replacement.

I ordered a soft roller brush attachment for my Dyson V10. When it arrived, clearly it was used. There was a lot of dust and dirt inside of it, as well as several strands of human hair in the roller and wheels, and it smelled really bad. Nowhere on the website did it mention that the product would be used. I contacted the company and I've heard nothing.

Review.Titre: they canceled my order. no refund money
Review.Contenu: they canceled my order in the name of the day they confirmed it. I tried to contact them by any means, but they never responded. The shopping fee in my account is still blocked. No answer for 3 days.

Sent me 2 used vacuum wands as new, not even matching wands.  I was promised the order within 7 days it took 24 days to get used junk.  I tried to cancel the order on 4 separate occasions and they refused, guess they wanted to clean out their warehouse of junk.  Won't be using this company for anything again, I've warned my friends to avoid them at any cost.  Terrible Customer Service!!!!! Lousy Stock!!!!!!

Review.Titre: The roller head had a lot of dust on it…
Review.Contenu: The roller head had a lot of dust on it and scuff marks on the plastic. Not sure if was used, could not tell.  The rollers themselves looked clean.  I sent an email and also left a voice mail, but never heard back.

Review.Titre: Had better experiences in the past.
Review.Contenu: I've ordered from Merchandise Mecca numerous times over the years mainly from eBay. The last 2 times I've ordered from the company my items somehow managed to end up where they shouldn't have before finding their way back to me. I live in Northwest Indiana yet this package (shipped from Detroit) ended up in Atlanta. The previous time it ended up in Florida. I'm sure USPS is to blame (maybe) but 2 for 2 isn't looking good especially from the same company. It's the same shipping address I've had for the past 20 years that's associated with my paypal account and I've never had a single package end up in the wrong location. As for the product itself the quality is great. I actually prefer these filters to the OEM filters because they seem more durable. Another reason I liked this kit was because the pre-filters were pre-cut, at least they used to be. The kit I ordered this time clearly states they're pre-cut but they weren't. It was a long folded up sheet that I had to cut to fit myself.

Review.Titre: The transaction went smoothly but box was smashed
Review.Contenu: The transaction went smoothly with good communication. The package arrived very beaten up and smashed on one side like something was thrown on top of it. Luckily it looks like the vacuum hose was not damaged. I have not plugged it in yet. I do have several pictures if you would like me to send them I will.
Took too long to ship. I had to inquire. Poor communication

Review.Titre: LONG TIME FOR A SMALL PACK

Review.Contenu: The delivery was on time, and the product was a great replacement to our old one. Thanks again!

Review.Titre: Shipping took longer than expected but…
Review.Contenu: Shipping took longer than expected but other than that I have no complaints. Product was exactly what I needed for less than I could find anywhere else. They even offered me 5% off, unfortunately I forgot to use my coupon code at checkout but that’s on me.

Damaged, but then it was reconditioned so I was not surprised by that. It may have been damaged in shipping as it was not well packed and the box had broken open by the time I received it.  UPS driver apologized and said it wasn't their fault.  But it works so I'm not returning it.

Review.Titre: Trying to beat the top guy?
Review.Contenu: No one gets a perfect score except Jesus.

Purchased replacement exhaust fan for my Nutone combination exhaust fan heater.  All went well.  There was a slight change in the orientation of the power cord to the shape of the housing which made the connection to the electrical source a little tighter than the original.  But it did work OK.

Review.Contenu: My bathroom vent covers are hard to find but you had them and they fit perfectly.  Quick delivery too and easy to install.  Thank you much.  I REALLY didn't want to have to replace the entire unit when it still works fine.  Just really old so need a facelift.  :)

Review.Titre: Dyson Stick Vacuum Motor Floor Head
Review.Contenu: Dyson Stick Vacuum Motor Floor Head.                     The item I ordered was pictured exactly what I needed. I am pleased with my order, and the shipping time was as I expected, it came with no damage.  Thank you very much.

Great replacement filters for my Hamilton Beach air cleaner. Good quality, catches dust and particles superbly, perfect fit. I really appreciate how well the filters are packed well for shipping also. Reasonable shipping time. Thank you MerchandiseMecca.

To be completely honest, I was skeptical since Merchandise Mecca came up as a small online retailer. They had exactly what I needed. Half the cost and faster shipping as the name brand on the largest online retailer in the world. I was very impressed with every step of the ordering process all the way up to delivery. I will definitely order from this company again.

I mistakenly ordered the incorrect filters and called to learn how to return them.  The representative immediately put in the information so I could print out a return label, and placed the order for the correct filters.  He was friendly and very efficient.  The new filters arrived sooner than I thought, and were exactly tie right ones.  Great service!!
It was easy to find what I needed on the website. So glad I was able to replace my Dyson animal vac carpet attachment! It was not too expensive and shipped quickly.
Seamless experience.  It shipped the very next day of order and arrived exactly as described and expected.  Will definitely use in the future should the need arise.

Review.Contenu: Worked well with shipping and delivery. Although, I ordered the wrong part, they returned with no questions.

Purchased the Dyson V10 Fluffy Powerhead Attachment . The Price was 30% lower than the other Online Stores and Dyson store, once I received the item I found what seemed to like a crack on the Transparent casing on both the sides of the top of the Head, I was little worried and called the Customer Service. The Customer service confirmed that it is not a crack, it is the way it comes back from the Manufacturer. He asked me to try to use it with Dyson V10 Vacuum and If I don't like it or it is nor working as expected, I can call back to return. I verified with my cousin who already have the Dyson V10 Absolute which comes with the soft roller head. It has the same crack like appearance that mine had. I started using the soft roller head in cleaning my Kitchen Floor and it seems to be working perfect without any issues.
OEM soft brush roller for my Dyson cyclone. Perfect fit, good quality and fast delivery. Just what I needed for my hardwood floors.
Perfect replacement electric motor and housing for Brian-Nutone bathroom exhaust fan and light. Fair price. RAPID delivery. Your site is now Bookmarked on my devices.
